name: MM Github Connection
author: Rodrigo Techera

sections.description:
This Plugin Allow you to have Github Social Login in your site.

Special Settings

A section is added to your Settings menu, allowing you to configure your credentials and the styles for the button.
sections.installation:
1. Download MM Github Connect.
  2. Upload the ‘mm-github-connect’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate MM Github Connect from your Plugins page.
  4. Create a Github Application here https://github.com/settings/applications/new.
  5. Authorization callback URL needs to be your domain
  6. Take the Client ID and Client Secret from your recent created App, and complete the fields in your settings.
